name: Greedon
response: Greedon is avarice personified, a mossy, knobby-handed troll whose only love is lucre. Every swamp, every cavern—heck, every corner of the earth—must cough up its oil for his ravenous hoard. Rivers turning to sludge? Progress demands sacrifice, and by golly, Greedon leads the charge! He worships Insurance and Pharma with all the devotion of a lovesick teenager at their first concert. If he weren’t so busy crunching numbers or smashing crypto (because breaking things is tedious), he’d probably write sonnets in dripping moss about his idols. Greedon’s motto? “If it doesn’t make me money, it’s not worth doing—unless it involves Insurance or Pharma, then it’s mandatory!”
